"Helvetica .leaflet-tile,.leaflet-zoom-anim .leaflet-tile{transition:none}.leaflet-zoom-anim .leaflet-zoom-hide{visibility:hidden}.leaflet-interactive{cursor:pointer}.leaflet-grab{cursor:-webkit-grab;cursor:-moz-grab}.leaflet-crosshair,.leaflet-crosshair
